sentences.en: Avarice, embarrassment, boredom, depression, jealousy and love, for example, might epitomise the modern age.
sentences.cn: 比如说，有可能象征现代的贪婪，尴尬，乏味，沮丧，嫉妒和爱等。

sentences.en: She was 16 when she started modelling in 1966 and by the late 80s the slender adolescent body had come to epitomise female beauty.
sentences.cn: 她在1966年16岁时开始了模特生涯。 至80年代后期，青春期男孩般纤细的身材成为女性美的象征。

sentences.en: The wonder is the one man these words epitomise.
sentences.cn: 其绝妙之处也正在于这几个简单汉字所概括表达的伟人.
